act:act.act:title: Protected Areas of British Columbia Act

bcl:lefttext.in:a: Bishop Bay – Monkey Beach Corridor Conservancy
Nakina – Inklin Rivers (Kuthai Area)/Yáwu Yaa Conservancy
Willison Creek – Nelson Lake/Sít' Héeni Conservancy

bcl:lefttext.in:strong: BISHOP BAY – MONKEY BEACH CORRIDOR CONSERVANCY

bcl:schedule.bcl:lefttext: All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 4, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 11 Tube 1975; except (1) those parts required for the ancillary facilities required for timber harvesting in lands excepted from or beyond the conservancy in the Monkey Beach Development; and (2) that part lying beyond a line drawn parallel to and 200 metres perpendicularly distant from the natural boundary of the sea.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 13 hectares (5 hectares of upland and 8 hectares of foreshore).

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 3, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 7 Tube 1967.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 462 hectares (310 hectares of upland and 152 hectares of foreshore).

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Sayward District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 13 Tube 1969; except that part below the natural boundary of the sea.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 230 hectares.

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 2, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 12 Tube 1967; except a 30 metre right of way centred on Ministry of Forests and Range road FSR 8387-01.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 356 hectares (288 hectares of upland and 68 hectares of foreshore).

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 3, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 11 Tube 1972; except (1) a 30 metre right of way centred on Ministry of Forests and Range road FSR 8034; and (2) that part below the natural boundary of the sea.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 3 508 hectares.

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 2, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 1 Tube 2006.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 39 241 hectares.

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 3, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 5 Tube 1968.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 95 hectares (74 hectares of upland and 21 hectares of foreshore).

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 2, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 6 Tube 1968; except (1) a 30 metre right of way centred on Ministry of Forests and Range Road Permit RO 1406, Forest Licence A16850; (2) District Lot 1041; (3) District Lot 1228; (4) Block A, Block B and Block C, District Lot 1613; and (5) that part below the natural boundary of the sea.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 960 hectares.

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 5, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 13 Tube 1975; except a 100 metre right of way centred on old Mouse Creek forest access road.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 362 hectares (188 hectares of upland and 174 hectares of foreshore).

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 3, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 7 Tube 1964; except that part below the natural boundary of the sea.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 1 261 hectares.

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 4, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 14 Tube 1975; except (1) "Quaal" Indian Reserve No. 3; (2) "Quaal" Indian Reserve No. 3A, District Lot 2231; and (3) that part lying beyond a line drawn parallel to and 200 metres perpendicularly distant from the natural boundary of the sea.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 3 300 hectares (3 260 hectares of upland and 40 hectares of foreshore).

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 5, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 9 Tube 1972; except that part lying beyond a line drawn parallel to and 200 metres perpendicularly distant from the natural boundary of the sea.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 62 hectares (27 hectares of upland and 35 hectares of foreshore).

bcl:lefttext.in:strong: NAKINA – INKLIN RIVERS (KUTHAI AREA)/YÁWU YAA CONSERVANCY

bcl:schedule.bcl:lefttext: All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Cassiar District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 7 Tube 2010; except Silver Salmon Lake Indian Reserve 5, District Lot 5477.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 26 047 hectares.

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 2, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 3 Tube 1991.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 83 hectares.

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 2, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 8 Tube 1970; except (1) a 30 metre right of way centred on Ministry of Forests and Range road FSR 8366; and (2) the land and water contained within the boundaries described as follows: commencing at UTM Zone 9 North 5693610 metres East 630700 metres; thence to the easterly 15 metre offset from the centre line of road FSR 8366-01, Nekite Mainline, at UTM Zone 9 North 5693610 metres East 630611 metres +/−; thence northerly along the easterly 15 metre offset from FSR 8366-01, Nekite Mainline, to UTM Zone 9 North 5693930 metres East 630569 metres +/−; thence to UTM Zone 9 North 5693930 metres East 630700 metres; thence to UTM Zone 9 North 5693610 metres East 630700 metres, being the point of commencement.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 481 hectares (331 hectares of upland and 150 hectares of foreshore).

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 1, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 1 Tube 1968; except (1) a 100 metre right of way centred on Ministry of Forests and Range road FSR 9125-01; and (2) that part in Frederick Arm below the natural boundary of the sea.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 2 978 hectares (2 330 hectares of upland and 648 hectares of foreshore).

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Queen Charlotte District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 3 Tube 2005; except (1) the Highway 16 right of way as shown on Plan PRP 8300 and on Plan 10, Tube 592 deposited in the Crown Land Registry; (2) a 30 metre road right of way centred on the Ministry of Forests and Range permit road R13349-4, Survey Main; and (3) a 30 metre right of way centred on the non-status road north of Lawn Creek through District Lot 257.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 16 231 hectares (16 209 hectares of upland and 22 hectares of foreshore).

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 3, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 14 Tube 1969; except that part below the natural boundary of the sea.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 2 617 hectares.

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Range 2, Coast District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 10 Tube 2008.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 331 hectares (237 hectares of upland and 94 hectares of foreshore).

All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Cassiar District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 12 Tube 2008.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 56 358 hectares.

bcl:lefttext.in:strong: WILLISON CREEK – NELSON LAKE/SÍT' HÉENI CONSERVANCY

bcl:schedule.bcl:lefttext: All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Cassiar District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 5 Tube 2010; except those portions of Mineral Claim 829202 and Mineral Claim 829222 lying outside the boundary of the mineral reserve established as site number 1005127 under B.C. Reg. 280/2007.
The whole conservancy containing approximately 10 300 hectares.
